english_example_sentence: If you reach this challenging peak, everyone will congratulate you.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты достигнешь этой сложной вершины, все тебя поздравят.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer sen bu zorlu zirveye ulaşsan, herkes seni tebrik eder.
